attributes.action: Allow left turn on red lights using the give way highway code rule.
attributes.additional_details: The USA have the right turn on red rule and it eases congestion considerably.
attributes.background: Many junctions across the UK get heavily congested due to drivers turning left at Red lights and causing tail backs. So why not allow a left turn at a red light using the give way priority rule. Not all junctions would benefit so specify junctions it's not allowed on.
